name: VestiFM
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Unofficial Vesti FM skill for Flash Briefing.

Get the latest news from Vesti FM, radio station based in Russia and owned by VGTRK. The station broadcasts in Moscow on 97.6 MHz.

Go to Settings in your Alexa app and find “Flash Briefing” to move Vesti FM to the top of your news brief.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
